page.title: 09VILLAGE WALK II
page.content: Start at the{Square,}look at the {Greyhound}which is a pub and the{Tally {Ho}which is also a pub that used to be called the Dog.Then go further on down the High Street and look at all the interesting houses on either side. Look at{Old Church Farm}Which is the Doctor's.Then go down Rookery Lane and look at{Brougton House}which is the best known and biggest house in Broughton. Then go back up the High Street and look at the{village hall which is used for lots of different things.Then go up the road a bit further and look at the{Cub and {Scout}hut.Then just by the hut you will see the{Dowse Room}that used to be a school. The date of the{Dowse {Room}is around{1640.
